Text:
This is a brilliant game so far! I've just made it to "the port" and now taking a break.

I'm using Win Vista and it works fine in full screen mode.

http://www.indiedb.com/games/first-fantasy-a-satirical-role-playing-game Voted!

Thanks for sharing this with us! 10 out of 10!
Thanks man, glad you're enjoying it so far!
I'm stuck already lol. I can't find The Great ClichĂŠ...
You can find The Great ClichĂŠ around the north coast of the first island. Here's a picture incase you're still stuck: http://i56[dot]tinypic[dot]com/whzc3m[dot]jpg
I'm rubbish lol - that image just comes up with a "server not found" error for me. Around the north coast you say? Hmm...i looked up there but could opnly find the way blocked by a too large boulder.
The first part was hard... no save point and no item to cure poison that damage you 60+ while in the sewer...
